content: free pattern - f81 cocktail umbrella cowl by jocelyn j tunney all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/2/19 © fairmount fibers ltd 2017 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 2 free pattern - f81 size instructions 9 5 high 16 top circumference unstretched and 32 bottom co 52 sts pm and join for working in the round being careful not circumference to twist materials work in 1x1 rib see stitch guide for 15 rnds manos del uruguay franca 100% superwash merino approx 114 yds/150 g shown in f47 blush increase round *k1 p1 k1 pfb repeat from * to end of round 65 sts us 15 / 10mm 16 circular needle or size to obtain gauge next round *k1 p1 k1 p2 repeat from * to end of round ring marker work previous round 2 more times gauge 12 sts and 12 row = 4 over 1x1 rib unstretched increase round *k1 pfb k1 p2 repeat from * to end of round 78 sts stitch guide next round *k1 p2 repeat from * to end of round 1x1 rib multiple of 2 sts all rnds *k1 p1 repeat from * to end work previous round 2 more times repeat this round for pattern increase round *k1 p2 k1 pfb p1 repeat from * to end of round 91 abbreviations sts bobble bind off co cast on next round *k1 p2 k1 p3 repeat from * to end of round k knit p purl work previous round 2 more times pfb purl front and back 1 st increase d repeat repeat bobble all sts loosely in pattern round s round s st s stitch es finishing weave in ends all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/2/19 © fairmount fibers ltd 2017 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 2
